suncertify
Class StringMatchCriterion

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.Criterion
      suncertify.StringMatchCriterion
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class StringMatchCriterion
extends Criterion

Criterion for String matching. We deal with exact String matches and prefix matches. We also provide support for case sensitivity. This class is immutable.

See Also:
Serialized Form

          Construct a new case-insensitive StringMatchCriterion that will accept partial string matches.

Constructor Detail

StringMatchCriterion

public StringMatchCriterion(StringField stringField,
                            boolean matchWholeWord,
                            boolean caseSensitive)
Construct a new StringMatchCriterion.

Parameters:
stringField - the StringField to match. May be null, in which case any String will match if matchWholeWord is false, and no string will match if matchWholeWord is true.
matchWholeWord - if true, match the entire String. Otherwise match if this is a substring of the String to match against.
caseSensitive - case sensitive String comparison

StringMatchCriterion

public StringMatchCriterion(StringField value,
                            boolean matchWholeWord)
Construct a new case-insensitive StringMatchCriterion.

Parameters:
value - the StringField to match
matchWholeWord - if true, match the entire String. Otherwise match if this is a substring of the String to match against.

StringMatchCriterion

public StringMatchCriterion(StringField value)
Construct a new case-insensitive StringMatchCriterion that will accept partial string matches.

Parameters:
value - the StringField to match
Method Detail

matches

public boolean matches(Field other)
Determine if we have a match for this Field by using the field's compareTo method. If our criterion field is null, we always return true.

Overrides:
matches in class Criterion
Parameters:
other - the value to compare to
Returns:
true if matches

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Get a string describing the criterion. The string contains the string field to match, and whether the match is case sensitive or for an exact match.

Overrides:
toString in class Criterion
Returns:
a string representation of the object
